meanings.definition: The act of disturbing or the state of being disturbed.
meanings.sent1: The loud disturbances outside woke me up from my nap.
meanings.sent2: The disturbances in the classroom made it hard to concentrate.
meanings.sent3: The disturbances caused by the barking dog were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The disturbances in the forest echoed like a chorus of chaos.
meanings.sent5: The sudden disturbances in the water startled the fish.

meanings.definition: An interruption of a settled and peaceful condition.
meanings.sent1: The unexpected disturbances during the meeting caused confusion.
meanings.sent2: The disturbances in the park disrupted the calm atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: The disturbances of the squirrel stealing the picnic food were amusing.
meanings.sent4: The disturbances in the sky painted a picture of unrest.
meanings.sent5: The disturbances in the garden shattered the tranquility of the evening.

meanings.sent1: The disturbances in her thoughts made it hard to focus.
meanings.sent2: The disturbances in his stomach indicated a possible illness.
meanings.sent3: The disturbances in the library due to the loud music were amusing.
meanings.sent4: The disturbances in the mind created a whirlwind of confusion.
meanings.sent5: The sudden disturbances in the air hinted at an approaching storm.
